meanings.definition: The two bones forming the upper jaw in vertebrates, located in front of the maxillae.
meanings.sent1: The premaxillae help in holding the teeth in place.
meanings.sent2: The dentist examined the premaxillae to check for any abnormalities.
meanings.sent3: The premaxillae decided to throw a party for the molars and incisors.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as strong as premaxillae, firmly holding her confidence.
meanings.sent5: The premaxillae, like guardians, protect the upper jaw from harm.
